channel.title: Help error
channel.description:
I downloaded a 317 client hoping to edit it and put it up online but when i tried out the base after about 90sec of running i would get an error and the whole thing would close down and i would have a text document in my client folder with the title hs_err_pid5176 the text would have somthing like [code]# # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d847786, pid=5176, tid=4804 # # JRE version: 6.0_21-b07 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (17.0-b17 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x57786] # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp #
--------------- T H R E A D ---------------
Current thread (0x00000000003fd000): JavaThread "CompilerThread1" daemon [_thread_in_native, id=4804, stack(0x0000000024730000,0x0000000024830000)]
siginfo: ExceptionCode=0xc0000005, reading address 0x0000000000000000
Registers: EAX=0x0000000027f71a60, EBX=0x000000002ad23b70, ECX=0x0000000027f71a30, EDX=0x000000002482c500 ESP=0x000000002482c0b0, EBP=0x00000000258ad2a0, ESI=0x000000002482c500, EDI=0x0000000027f71a30 EIP=0x000000006d847786, EFLAGS=0x0000000000010202

[/code] Please help ... thank you :) also this is not only with this client and server but also happens with a few other 317's

item.title: Help error
item.dc:creator: @pugs1811 pugs1811
item.description:
@pugs1811 wrote:

ok so i changed my previouse client from @echo off Title YourClient name here cd Client Start JAVAW -Xmx400m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 lowmem members 32 exit
to many different variations combined with yours and it doesn’t work the only way i ever got the client to open was with the original way and it shuts down after 90sec

Read full topic

item.title: Help error
item.dc:creator: @wavemaker wavemaker
item.description:
@wavemaker wrote:

client ofc

PS: You only need to replace the first bit w/“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe”

Read full topic

item.title: Help error
item.dc:creator: @pugs1811 pugs1811
item.description:
@pugs1811 wrote:

[quote=“wavemaker, post:4, topic:374811”]Bingo!

replace your run.bat with this code

@echo off title Compile "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx256m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause [/quote]
Is this in the server or client ? also thanks so much for your help

Read full topic

item.title: Help error
item.dc:creator: @wavemaker wavemaker
item.description:
@wavemaker wrote:

Bingo!

replace your run.bat with this code

@echo off
title Compile
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx256m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Help error
item.dc:creator: @pugs1811 pugs1811
item.description:
@pugs1811 wrote:

wavemaker:

You really havent given us alot of information about your problem other than what the error looks like. Give us details like: what your running, is your computer 32bit or 64bit, etc.

All that information is in the error report under system… but i am running a windows 7 64bit computer

Read full topic

item.title: Help error
item.dc:creator: @wavemaker wavemaker
item.description:
@wavemaker wrote:

You really havent given us alot of information about your problem other than what the error looks like. Give us details like: what your running, is your computer 32bit or 64bit, etc.

Read full topic
